vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
αὐτάρκ-εια, ἡ,
self-sufficiency, independence, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II concrete, a sufficiency, [Refs 3rd c.AD+]; a competence, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: contentment, having all of one’s needs, sufficiency
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
contentment, having all of one’s needs, sufficiency
a competence of the necessaries of life, sufficiency 2Cor. 9:8; a frame of mind viewing one's lot as sufficient, contentedness, 1Tim. 6:6*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: lo que es necesario ; autosuficiencia ; satisfacción
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 充足, 勝任 (林後 9:8)
2) 知足, 自足 (提前 6:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 充足, 胜任 (林后 9:8)
2) 知足, 自足 (提前 6:6)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự tự thoả lòng; sự tự hài lòng
